name: 19th Century Farmhouse in the Loire
description:
DESCRIPTION
In the land of castles and the sweetness of life, the 19th Century Farmhouse in the Loire is surrounded by its freestone wall, giving the place a privileged setting, space, quality of accommodation, here nature expresses itself completely.
This charming Farmhouse offers you a friendly welcome in a site of character with two spaces which can accommodate 80 people seated, to organize your wedding, anniversay simply to spend a pleasant evening with friends and family.
Surprise your guests, serve your cocktails in the middle of nature on the lawns of the park, near the reception rooms with the charm of yesteryear, full of character.
Farmhouse room:
150 cocktail seats and more with the terrace around the swimming pool.
40 people seated.
Fully equipped, our rooms allow you to cook yourself or to call on a service of your choice: Caterer - Cook - The local speciality: Fouées meals - Breakfasts
Room of the Barn:
130 cocktail seats and more
80 people seated.
Fully equipped, our rooms allow you to cook yourself or to call on a service of your choice: Caterer - Cook - The local speciality: Meals Fouées - Breakfasts
Accomodation: Total of 10 rooms / 38 beds
-The Barn: Capacity 15 people
Vast charming residence equipped with top-of-the-range equipment.
Amenities: Professional kitchen: Electric hotplates, Professional dishwasher. Worktop, robot and small kitchen equipment, ironing board, vacuum cleaner, refrigerator, freezer, coffee maker, oven, microwave...
In common: Washing machine and dryer.
Provision: Cot and high chair for children.
-The House with Blue Shutters: Capacity 10 people
Former residence of the guardian of the castle of Jalesnes, independent, appreciated for its charm and its spaces.
Amenities: Dishes, pots, pressure cooker, pots, pans, kitchen utensils, coffee maker, toaster. Robot and small kitchen equipment, raclette appliances provided, ironing board, vacuum cleaner, refrigerator, freezer, oven, microwave... Washing machine and dryer.
Provision: Cot and high chair for children.
-Le Grand Tilleul: Capacity 7 to 8 people
Typical Angevin rural gîte, warm and friendly.
Amenities: Dishes, pots, pressure cooker, pots, pans, kitchen utensils. Ironing board, vacuum cleaner, refrigerator, coffee maker, oven, dishwasher, microwave...
In common: Washing machine and dryer.
Provision: Cot and high chair for children.
-The Bread Oven: Capacity 2 people
Your private setting within the Domaine.
Amenities: Kitchen utensils, coffee maker, toaster. Ironing board, vacuum cleaner, fridge, coffee maker, oven, sofa, microwave...
Shared: Washing machine and dryer.
Provision: Cot and high chair for children.
-Le Haut Plessis: Capacity 2 people
With a view of the swimming pool and close to the relaxation area.
Le Haut Plessis is the ideal place for your well-being breaks.
Amenities: Crockery, pots, pans, robot and kitchen utensils. Ironing board, vacuum cleaner, refrigerator, gas hob, coffee maker, oven, sofa, microwave...
There is then also accommodation nearby in the form of a hotel which is within a 15 minute walk for the remainder of your guests.
The venue comes fully equipment with the following: Crockery, Dutch oven, pressure cookers, pots, pans, kitchen utensils. Professional piano with oven, a refrigerating cabinet, large freezer, small freezer, a working micro-: coffee makers, kettles, toaster, robot and small rectangular or round equipment, baby beds and outdoor lounges for caterers.
Pets allowed, games for children and adults, cot available, bicycles available, swimming pool, fishing, running,... Ideal place for your receptions, combining calm and numerous activities. With space, everything is allowed, the choice is yours! We also have a wellness room: spa, sauna...for you and your guests to enjoy! Additionally we have space for 100 cars to park.
For more information please do get in touch and we will be more than happy to send you a bespoke quotation.
